root_path.description: Root path where data will be logged
root_path.title: Root Path

session_name.description: Name of the session. This will be used to create a folder in the root path. If not provided, it will be generated using subject and date.
session_name.title: Session Name

allow_dirty_repo.description: Allow running from a dirty repository
allow_dirty_repo.title: Allow Dirty Repo

AindManipulatorAdditionalSettings.description: Additional settings for the manipulator device
AindManipulatorAdditionalSettings.title: AindManipulatorAdditionalSettings

device_name.description: Must match a device name in rig/instrument
device_name.title: Device name

description.const: Calibration of the load cells system
description.default: Calibration of the load cells system
description.title: Description

full_step_to_mm.title: Full step to mm. Used to convert steps to SI Units

axis_configuration.title: Axes configuration. Only the axes that are configured will be enabled.

AindManipulatorDevice.description: Overrides the default settings for the manipulator device by spec'ing additional_settings field
AindManipulatorDevice.title: AindManipulatorDevice

triggered_camera_controller.description: Required camera controller to triggered cameras.

monitoring_camera_controller.description: Optional camera controller for monitoring cameras.

AindVrForagingTaskLogic.description:
Main task logic model for the AIND VR Foraging task.

This is the top-level class that encapsulates the complete task logic
specification for the virtual reality foraging behavioral experiment.
It includes all task parameters, environment specifications, and control settings.

stage_name.description: Optional stage name the `Task` object instance represents.
stage_name.title: Stage Name

AindVrForagingTaskLogic.title: AindVrForagingTaskLogic

AindVrForagingTaskParameters.description:
Complete parameter specification for the AIND VR Foraging task.

This class contains all configurable parameters for the VR foraging task,
including environment structure, task mode settings, operation control,
and numerical updaters for dynamic parameter modification.

rng_seed.description: Seed of the random number generator
rng_seed.title: Rng Seed

AindVrForagingTaskParameters.title: AindVrForagingTaskParameters

AudioControl.description:
Controls audio feedback parameters for the task.

This class manages audio cue generation including tone duration and frequency
for auditory feedback during the behavioral task.
AudioControl.title: AudioControl

step_acceleration_interval.description: Acceleration of the step interval in microseconds
step_acceleration_interval.title: Acceleration

maximum_step_interval.title: Configures the time between step motor pulses (us) used when starting or stopping a movement

max_limit.title: Maximum limit in SI units. A value of 0 disables this limit.

min_limit.title: Minimum limit in SI units. A value of 0 disables this limit.

BetaDistribution.description:
A beta probability distribution.

Continuous distribution bounded between 0 and 1. Commonly used
for modeling probabilities and proportions.
BetaDistribution.title: BetaDistribution

BetaDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a beta distribution.

Defined by alpha and beta shape parameters.
BetaDistributionParameters.title: BetaDistributionParameters

BinomialDistribution.description:
A binomial probability distribution.

Models the number of successes in a fixed number of independent
Bernoulli trials with constant success probability.
BinomialDistribution.title: BinomialDistribution

BinomialDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a binomial distribution.

Defined by number of trials (n) and success probability (p).
BinomialDistributionParameters.title: BinomialDistributionParameters

Block.description:
Configuration for a single experimental block.

A block represents a period of the experiment with specific environment
statistics and ending conditions. Each block defines the environmental
parameters and termination criteria for that experimental phase.

end_conditions.description: List of end conditions that must be true for the block to end.
end_conditions.title: End Conditions

Block.title: Block

BlockEndConditionChoice.description:
Block end condition based on number of choices made.

This condition ends a block after the animal has made a specified number
of choices (e.g., patch visits or reward attempts).

value.description: Number of choices after which the block ends.

BlockEndConditionChoice.title: BlockEndConditionChoice

BlockEndConditionDistance.description:
Block end condition based on distance traveled.

This condition ends a block after the animal has traveled a specified distance.

value.description: Distance after which the block ends.

BlockEndConditionDistance.title: BlockEndConditionDistance

BlockEndConditionDuration.description:
Block end condition based on time duration.

This condition ends a block after a specified amount of time has elapsed.

value.description: Time after which the block ends.

BlockEndConditionDuration.title: BlockEndConditionDuration

BlockEndConditionPatchCount.description:
Block end condition based on number of patches visited.

This condition ends a block after the animal has visited a specified
number of unique patches.

value.description: Number of patches after which the block will end.

BlockEndConditionPatchCount.title: BlockEndConditionPatchCount

BlockEndConditionReward.description:
Block end condition based on number of rewards obtained.

This condition ends a block after the animal has obtained a specified
number of rewards.

value.description: Number of rewards after which the block ends.

BlockEndConditionReward.title: BlockEndConditionReward

BlockStructure.description:
Structure defining the sequence and sampling of experimental blocks.

This class manages multiple experimental blocks and determines how they
are presented during the experiment (sequentially or randomly).
BlockStructure.title: BlockStructure

frame_rate.description: Frame rate of the trigger to all cameras
frame_rate.title: Frame Rate

frame_rate.description: Frame rate of the trigger to all cameras
frame_rate.title: Frame Rate

ClampedMultiplicativeRateFunction.description:
A patch update function that applies multiplicative rate updates with bounds.

Update in the form of x = clamp(x * rate ** tick_value).
This function multiplies the current value by the rate parameter, maintaining
the result within specified minimum and maximum bounds. Useful for percentage-
based changes and exponential decay/growth patterns.

rate.description: Rate of the replenishment, in value per rule unit.

ClampedMultiplicativeRateFunction.title: ClampedMultiplicativeRateFunction

ClampedRateFunction.description:
A patch update function that applies a clamped rate-based update.

Update in the form of x = clamp(x + rate * tick_value).
This function updates values at a specified rate while keeping results within
defined minimum and maximum bounds. The rate is applied per rule unit (e.g.,
time, distance, choices).

rate.description: Rate of the replenishment, in value per rule unit.

ClampedRateFunction.title: ClampedRateFunction

target_device.description: Optional device name to provide user additional information
target_device.title: Target Device

CtcmFunction.description:
A patch update function that uses a continuous-time Markov chain (CTMC)
to determine patch updates based on a transition probability matrix.

It expects a transition matrix that takes the current value of the variable
of interest (e.g. Probability), and outputs a new value based on the defined
stochastic process in the transition matrix.

rho.description: The underlying value goverining the stochastic process
rho.title: Rho

CtcmFunction.title: CtcmFunction

EnvironmentStatistics.description:
Defines the statistical properties of the foraging environment.

This class specifies the patches available in the environment, their transition
probabilities, and initial state occupancy. It forms the core specification
for the foraging environment structure.

transition_matrix.description: Determines the transition probabilities between patches
transition_matrix.title: Transition Matrix

first_state_occupancy.description: Determines the first state the animal will be in. If null, it will be randomly drawn.
first_state_occupancy.title: First State Occupancy

EnvironmentStatistics.title: EnvironmentStatistics

ExponentialDistribution.description:
An exponential probability distribution.

Models time between events in a Poisson process. Commonly used
for wait times and inter-event intervals.
ExponentialDistribution.title: ExponentialDistribution

ExponentialDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for an exponential distribution.

Defined by the rate parameter (inverse of mean).
ExponentialDistributionParameters.title: ExponentialDistributionParameters

GammaDistribution.description:
A gamma probability distribution.

Generalizes the exponential distribution. Used for modeling
positive continuous variables with right-skewed distributions.
GammaDistribution.title: GammaDistribution

GammaDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a gamma distribution.

Defined by shape (k) and rate (θ⁻¹) parameters.
GammaDistributionParameters.title: GammaDistributionParameters

LogNormalDistribution.description:
A log-normal probability distribution.

Distribution where the logarithm of the variable is normally distributed.
Always produces positive values and is right-skewed.
LogNormalDistribution.title: LogNormalDistribution

LogNormalDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a log-normal distribution.

Defined by the mean and standard deviation of the underlying normal distribution.
LogNormalDistributionParameters.title: LogNormalDistributionParameters

LookupTableFunction.description:
A patch update function that uses lookup table interpolation.

Update in the form of x = lut_values[lerp(lut_keys, lut_values, tick_value)].
This function maps input values to output values using a lookup table with
linear interpolation between defined points. Useful for complex, non-linear
reward schedules or parameter updates.

lut_keys.description: List of keys of the lookup table
lut_keys.title: Lut Keys

lut_values.description: List of values of the lookup table
lut_values.title: Lut Values

LookupTableFunction.title: LookupTableFunction

Measurement.description: Input for water valve calibration class

valve_open_interval.description: Time between two consecutive valve openings (s)
valve_open_interval.title: Valve open interval

repeat_count.description: Number of times the valve opened.
repeat_count.title: Repeat count

Measurement.title: Measurement

MovableSpoutControl.description:
Controls the movable water spout behavior for reward delivery.

This class configures how the movable spout operates, including when it's
enabled, timing for reward collection, and retraction distance for operant
conditioning protocols.

enabled.description: Whether the movable spout is enabled
enabled.title: Enabled

retracting_distance.description: The distance, relative to the default position, the spout will be retracted by
retracting_distance.title: Retracting Distance

MovableSpoutControl.title: MovableSpoutControl

NormalDistribution.description:
A normal (Gaussian) probability distribution.

Bell-shaped distribution symmetric around the mean, commonly used
for modeling naturally occurring random variables.
NormalDistribution.title: NormalDistribution

NormalDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a normal (Gaussian) distribution.

Defined by mean (center) and standard deviation (spread).
NormalDistributionParameters.title: NormalDistributionParameters

NumericalUpdater.description:
A numerical updater that modifies task parameters during execution.

This class combines an operation type with parameters to define how values
should be updated dynamically during the task, enabling adaptive behavior
based on animal performance or other criteria.

operation.description: Operation to perform on the parameter

NumericalUpdater.title: NumericalUpdater

NumericalUpdaterOperation.description:
Enumeration of operations that can be performed by numerical updaters.

These operations define how parameter values are modified during task execution,
allowing for dynamic adjustment of task parameters based on performance or other criteria.
NumericalUpdaterOperation.title: NumericalUpdaterOperation

NumericalUpdaterParameters.description:
Parameters that control how numerical updates are applied to task values.

These parameters define the bounds and increments for updating numerical values
during task execution, ensuring values stay within acceptable ranges.

on_success.description: Value used to update the parameter by on success
on_success.title: On Success

on_failure.description: Value used to update the parameter by on failure
on_failure.title: On Failure

increment.description: Value to increment the parameter by
increment.title: Increment

decrement.description: Value to decrement the parameter by
decrement.title: Decrement

NumericalUpdaterParameters.title: NumericalUpdaterParameters

OdorControl.description:
Controls the odor delivery system parameters.

This class manages the olfactory stimulus delivery system, including flow rates,
valve timing, and carrier gas configuration. It ensures proper odor concentration
and delivery timing for the behavioral task.

valve_max_open_time.description: Maximum time (s) the valve can be open continuously
valve_max_open_time.title: Valve Max Open Time

target_total_flow.description: Target total flow (ml/s) of the odor mixture
target_total_flow.title: Target Total Flow

use_channel_3_as_carrier.description: Whether to use channel 3 as carrier
use_channel_3_as_carrier.title: Use Channel 3 As Carrier

target_odor_flow.description: Target odor flow (ml/s) in the odor mixture
target_odor_flow.title: Target Odor Flow

OdorControl.title: OdorControl

OdorSpecification.description:
Specifies odor delivery parameters for olfactory cues in the VR environment.

Odors can be delivered at specific locations to provide additional sensory
information for navigation and foraging decisions.

index.description: Index of the odor to be used
index.title: Index

OdorSpecification.title: OdorSpecification

device_name.description: Name of the device being calibrated
device_name.title: Device name

description.const: Calibration of the harp olfactometer device
description.default: Calibration of the harp olfactometer device
description.title: Description

flow_rate.title: Target flow rate. mL/min. If channel_type == CARRIER, this value is ignored.

OnThisPatchEntryRewardFunction.description: A RewardFunction that is applied when the animal enters the patch.

amount.description: Defines the amount of reward replenished per rule unit.

probability.description: Defines the probability of reward replenished per rule unit.

available.description: Defines the amount of reward available replenished in the patch per rule unit.

OnThisPatchEntryRewardFunction.title: OnThisPatchEntryRewardFunction

OperantLogic.description:
Defines operant conditioning logic for reward delivery in the VR foraging task.

This class controls when and how rewards are delivered based on animal behavior,
implementing stopping requirements, collection timeouts, and spatial constraints.

is_operant.description: Will the trial implement operant logic
is_operant.title: Is Operant

stop_duration.description: Duration (s) the animal must stop for to lock its choice

time_to_collect_reward.description: Time(s) the animal has to collect the reward
time_to_collect_reward.title: Time To Collect Reward

grace_distance_threshold.description: Virtual distance (cm) the animal must be within to not abort the current choice
grace_distance_threshold.title: Grace Distance Threshold

OperantLogic.title: OperantLogic

OperationControl.description:
Master control class for all operational hardware systems.

This class aggregates all the hardware control specifications including
movable spout, odor delivery, position tracking, and audio systems.
It provides a centralized configuration point for all task hardware.
OperationControl.title: OperationControl

OutsideRewardFunction.description: A RewardFunction that is applied when the animal is outside of the patch.

amount.description: Defines the amount of reward replenished per rule unit.

probability.description: Defines the probability of reward replenished per rule unit.

available.description: Defines the amount of reward available replenished in the patch per rule unit.

delay.description: Delay (s) before the replenishment starts after the rule is triggered.
delay.title: Delay

OutsideRewardFunction.title: OutsideRewardFunction

Patch.description: Represents statistics for a patch in the VR foraging task.

odor_specification.description: The optional odor specification of the patch

reward_specification.description: The optional reward specification of the patch

patch_terminators.description: The optional termination specification of the patch
patch_terminators.title: Patch Terminators

Patch.title: Patch

PatchRewardFunction.description:
A RewardFunction that is applied when the animal is inside the patch.
For the purposes of this function post-patch and inter-patch are excluded.

amount.description: Defines the amount of reward replenished per rule unit.

probability.description: Defines the probability of reward replenished per rule unit.

available.description: Defines the amount of reward available replenished in the patch per rule unit.

PatchRewardFunction.title: PatchRewardFunction

count.description: Number of choices the animal must make to terminate the patch

PatchTerminatorOnDistance.description: Terminates the patch after a "count" distance.

count.description: Number of distance units to wait before terminating the patch

PatchTerminatorOnDistance.title: PatchTerminatorOnDistance

PatchTerminatorOnRejection.description: Terminates the patch after a reward site where the animal does not stop in "count" reward sites.

count.description: Number of reward sites the animal must not stop in to terminate the patch

PatchTerminatorOnRejection.title: PatchTerminatorOnRejection

count.description: Number of rewards the animal must collect to terminate the patch

PatchTerminatorOnTime.description: Terminates the patch after a "count" seconds.

count.description: Number of seconds to wait before terminating the patch

PatchTerminatorOnTime.title: PatchTerminatorOnTime

PatchVirtualSitesGenerator.description:
Defines the generation specifications for all virtual site types within a patch.

This class contains generators for all the different types of virtual sites
that can appear within a patch environment. Each generator defines how sites
of that type should be created with their properties and distributions.

inter_site.description: Generator of the inter-site virtual sites

inter_patch.description: Generator of the inter-patch virtual sites

post_patch.description: Generator of the post-patch virtual sites

reward_site.description: Generator of the reward-site virtual sites

PatchVirtualSitesGenerator.title: PatchVirtualSitesGenerator

PdfDistribution.description:
A custom probability density function distribution.

Allows defining arbitrary discrete distributions by specifying
probability values and their corresponding indices.
PdfDistribution.title: PdfDistribution

PdfDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a custom probability density function distribution.

Defined by explicit probability values and their corresponding indices.
Probabilities are automatically normalized to sum to 1.

index.description: The index of the probability density function
index.title: Index

PdfDistributionParameters.title: PdfDistributionParameters

PersistentRewardFunction.description: A RewardFunction that is always active.

amount.description: Defines the amount of reward replenished per rule unit.

probability.description: Defines the probability of reward replenished per rule unit.

available.description: Defines the amount of reward available replenished in the patch per rule unit.

PersistentRewardFunction.title: PersistentRewardFunction

PoissonDistribution.description:
A Poisson probability distribution.

Models the number of events occurring in a fixed interval of time or space
when events occur independently at a constant rate.
PoissonDistribution.title: PoissonDistribution

PoissonDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a Poisson distribution.

Defined by the rate parameter (average number of events).

rate.description: Rate parameter of the Poisson process that generates the distribution
rate.title: Rate

PoissonDistributionParameters.title: PoissonDistributionParameters

PositionControl.description:
Controls the position tracking and movement detection parameters.

This class manages the position control system including coordinate transformations,
initial positioning, signal filtering, and movement detection thresholds for the
virtual reality foraging task.

frequency_filter_cutoff.description: Cutoff frequency (Hz) of the low-pass filter used to filter the velocity signal.
frequency_filter_cutoff.title: Frequency Filter Cutoff

velocity_threshold.description: Threshold (cm/s) of the velocity signal used to detect when the animal is moving.
velocity_threshold.title: Velocity Threshold

PositionControl.title: PositionControl

x.description: X coordinate of the top-left corner
x.title: X

y.description: Y coordinate of the top-left corner
y.title: Y

RenderSpecification.description:
Defines visual rendering properties for virtual environment elements.

This class controls the visual appearance of virtual sites, including
contrast and other visual parameters that affect how elements are rendered
in the VR environment.
RenderSpecification.title: RenderSpecification

RewardSpecification.description:
Specifies reward parameters and behavior for a patch.

This class defines all aspects of reward delivery including amounts, probabilities,
delays, operant logic, and dynamic update functions. It serves as the complete
specification for how rewards are managed in a given Patch.

operant_logic.description: The optional operant logic of the reward

delay.description: The optional distribution where the delay to reward will be drawn from

amount.description: Initial amount of reward in microliters

available.description: Initial amount of reward available in the patch in microliters

RewardSpecification.title: RewardSpecification

RigCalibration.description: Container class for calibration models. In a future release these will be moved to the respective devices
RigCalibration.title: RigCalibration

Scalar.description:
A scalar distribution that returns a constant value.

Useful for fixed parameters that don't vary across trials or samples.
Scalar.title: Scalar

ScalarDistributionParameter.description:
Parameters for a scalar (constant) distribution.

Represents a deterministic value that always returns the same number.

value.description: The static value of the distribution
value.title: Value

ScalarDistributionParameter.title: ScalarDistributionParameter

ScalingParameters.description:
Parameters for scaling and offsetting sampled distribution values.
Scaling is applied as (value * scale + offset).

Applies linear transformation: result = (value * scale) + offset.

scale.description: Scaling factor to apply on the sampled distribution
scale.title: Scale

offset.description: Offset factor to apply on the sampled distribution
offset.title: Offset

ScalingParameters.title: ScalingParameters

SetValueFunction.description:
A patch update function that sets the target to a specific value.

Update in the form of x = value.
This function directly sets the target parameter to a value drawn from the
specified distribution, ignoring the current value. Useful for resetting
parameters or applying discrete changes.

value.description: Sets the value of the target to this value.

SetValueFunction.title: SetValueFunction

Size.description:
Represents 2D dimensions with width and height.

Used for defining texture sizes, corridor dimensions, and other 2D measurements
in the VR foraging environment.
Size.title: Size

gamma.description: Gamma. If None, will disable gamma correction.
gamma.title: Gamma

adc_bit_depth.description: ADC bit depth. If None will be left as default.

pixel_format.description: Pixel format. If None will be left as default.

video_writer.description: Video writer. If not provided, no video will be saved.

Texture.description:
Defines visual texture properties for VR environment surfaces.

Textures are applied to walls, floors, and other surfaces in the virtual
environment to provide visual cues and context for the foraging task.

Texture name must correspond to a valid texture asset loaded in the workflow.
Texture.title: Texture

device_name.description: Must match a device name in rig/instrument
device_name.title: Device name

brake_lookup_calibration.description: Brake lookup calibration. Each pair of values define (input [torque], output [brake set-point U16])
brake_lookup_calibration.title: Brake Lookup Calibration

TreadmillSpecification.description:
Defines treadmill friction properties for virtual sites.

This class controls the friction experienced by the animal when moving
through different virtual sites, allowing for varied locomotion dynamics
across different regions of the environment.

friction.description: Friction of the treadmill (0-1). The drawn value must be between 0 and 1

TreadmillSpecification.title: TreadmillSpecification

TruncationParameters.description:
Parameters for truncating a distribution to a specified range. Truncation should
be applied after sampling and scaling.

The truncation_mode determines how out-of-bounds values are handled:
- "exclude": Resample until a value within [min, max] is obtained.
If after a certain number of attempts no valid value is found, it
will use the average of sampled values and pick the closest bound.
- "clamp": Clamp values to the nearest bound within [min, max].
Used to constrain sampled values within minimum and maximum bounds.

min.description: Minimum value of the sampled distribution
min.title: Min

max.description: Maximum value of the sampled distribution
max.title: Max

TruncationParameters.title: TruncationParameters

UniformDistribution.description:
A uniform probability distribution.

All values between min and max have equal probability of being sampled.
UniformDistribution.title: UniformDistribution

UniformDistributionParameters.description:
Parameters for a uniform distribution.

Defined by minimum and maximum bounds of the distribution.
UniformDistributionParameters.title: UniformDistributionParameters

UpdaterTarget.description:
Enumeration of parameters that can be targeted by numerical updaters.

These targets define which task parameters can be dynamically modified
during task execution to adapt to animal performance or experimental needs.
UpdaterTarget.title: UpdaterTarget

output_arguments.default: -vf "scale=out_color_matrix=bt709:out_range=full,format=bgr24,scale=out_range=full" -c:v h264_nvenc -pix_fmt yuv420p -color_range full -colorspace bt709 -color_trc linear -tune hq -preset p4 -rc vbr -cq 12 -b:v 0M -metadata author="Allen Institute for Neural Dynamics" -maxrate 700M -bufsize 350M
output_arguments.title: Output Arguments

VirtualSite.description:
THIS CLASS IS NOT MEANT TO BE DIRECTLY INSTANTIATED.
Represents a specific virtual site instance in the VR environment.

This class defines a concrete virtual site with specific properties like position,
length, and associated specifications. It is typically generated from VirtualSiteGenerator
templates rather than being directly instantiated in the DSL.

Note: This class is primarily used internally for runtime site generation
and is not meant to be directly instantiated in task configuration DSL.

start_position.description: Start position of the virtual site (cm)
start_position.title: Start Position

odor_specification.description: The optional odor specification of the virtual site

reward_specification.description: The optional reward specification of the virtual site

render_specification.description: The optional render specification of the virtual site

VirtualSite.title: VirtualSite

VirtualSiteGenerator.description:
Generates virtual site specifications with randomized properties.

This class defines templates for creating virtual sites with variable properties
like length and rendering specifications. It's used to generate diverse virtual
environments for the foraging task.

length_distribution.description: Distribution of the length of the virtual site

VirtualSiteGenerator.title: VirtualSiteGenerator

VirtualSiteLabels.description:
Enumeration of virtual site types in the VR foraging environment.

These labels categorize different regions of the virtual environment,
each serving different functional roles in the foraging task.
VirtualSiteLabels.title: VirtualSiteLabels

VirtualSiteRewardSpecification.description:
THIS CLASS IS NOT MEANT TO BE DIRECTLY INSTANTIATED.
Specifies reward parameters and behavior for a virtual site.

Note: This class is primarily used internally for runtime site generation
and is not meant to be directly instantiated in task configuration DSL.

operant_logic.description: The optional operant logic of the reward

delay.description: The optional distribution where the delay to reward will be drawn from

VirtualSiteRewardSpecification.title: VirtualSiteRewardSpecification

VisualCorridor.description:
Defines a visual corridor segment in the VR environment.

Visual corridors are the basic building blocks of the VR environment,
defining spatial regions with specific textures, dimensions, and positions.

id.description: Id of the visual corridor object
id.title: Id

VisualCorridor.title: VisualCorridor

WallTextures.description:
Defines textures for all walls of a visual corridor in the VR environment.

This class specifies the visual appearance of corridor surfaces including
floor, ceiling, and side walls, allowing for complex visual environments
with different textures on each surface.
WallTextures.title: WallTextures

device_name.description: Name of the device being calibrated
device_name.title: Device name

description.const: Calibration of the water valve delivery system
description.default: Calibration of the water valve delivery system
description.title: Description

WaterValveCalibrationOutput.description: Output for water valve calibration class

interval_average.description: Dictionary keyed by measured valve interval and corresponding average single event volume.
interval_average.title: Interval average

slope.description: Slope of the linear regression : Volume(g) = Slope(g/s) * time(s) + offset(g)
slope.title: Regression slope

offset.description: Offset of the linear regression : Volume(g) = Slope(g/s) * time(s) + offset(g)
offset.title: Regression offset

r2.description: R2 metric from the linear model.
r2.title: R2

valid_domain.description: The optional time-intervals the calibration curve was calculated on.
valid_domain.title: Valid domain

WaterValveCalibrationOutput.title: WaterValveCalibrationOutput

video_writer.description: Video writer. If not provided, no video will be saved.

aind_behavior_vr_foraging__task_logic__V.description:
Represents a 3D point or vector with x, y, and z coordinates.

Used for 3D positioning and movement in the virtual reality environment,
including camera positions, object locations, and 3D transformations.
aind_behavior_vr_foraging__task_logic__V.title: Vector3
